item.title: Re: Nonja
item.content:encoded: I have another question. I'm going to be gone for a few days, and I realized that there will be no internet where I'm going. The trip is a week long, so I won't be able to wind my nonja, so what can I do? The vice kage can't wind them can they? Do I have to let someone else become kage while I'm gone? Thanks.

item.title: Re: Nonja
item.content:encoded: Thank you. You have been a huge help.

item.title: Re: Nonja
item.content:encoded: A nonja costs 25,000 village ryo to buy at first and 20 stam to wind the first day. Then all you have to worry about is 20 stam per nonja every 3 days. No reoccuring ryo costs.

item.title: Nonja
item.content:encoded: I have a village, but we are really small (5 people), so I looked into nonja, and it said "Each nonja costs 25,000 village ryo and 20 stam of the kage per nonja every 3 days." Does this mean each nonja costs 25,000 village ryo AND 20 stanima from the kage every 3 days? Or does it mean each nonja costs 25,000 village ryo ONCE and then 20 stanima every 3 days? I think it means the second one right? I just want to make sure before we actually buy one. Thanks.
